long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save money on ads by Smart-Tracking your brand Keywords!

AdsHighlights is a Google extension that helps you identify the keywords that you should be protecting and using. With this tool, you can track the performance of thousands of keywords within minutes, select which ones to spend your budget on, and save money by stopping ads on those that none of your competitors are bidding on.
This easy-to-use tool has made protecting YOUR Brand Keywords more effortless than ever before. With AdsHighlights you won't have to guess which keywords are the best for your campaign. AdsHighlights will show you exactly which keywords you should protect or ignore. And yes! you can monitor your keywords on a global scale!
Reduce your marketing budget and increase your ROI with AdsHighlights
